text: The Australian Journal of Politics and History is an academic journal that includes articles about history, political studies, and international affairs, concentrating on Australia, the Asia-Pacific region, and modern Europe. It was established in 1955 and was published triannually until 1997. In 1998 it began publishing quarterly. It is currently edited by Andrew Bonnell and Matt McDonald, both at the University of Queensland. It is published by Wiley- Blackwell. == Indexing and abstracting == It is indexed or abstracted in the following services:Australian Journal of Politics and History Journal Information * Academic Search * Academic ASAP * Arts & Humanities Citation Index * Cambridge Scientific Abstracts * Current Contents/Arts & Humanities * IBSS: International Bibliography of the Social Sciences * InfoTrac * ProQuest == References == Journal homepage http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/10.1111/(ISSN)1467-8497 == External links == * Category:Publications established in 1955 Category:History journals Category:English-language journals Category:Quarterly journals Category:Wiley- Blackwell academic journals Category:1955 establishments in Australia Category:University of Queensland academic journals
title: Australian Journal of Politics and History
